cyclone.name: SALLY
cyclone.current_location: about 65 mi E of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: tracking slowly north-northeast toward the north-central Gulf Coast (southeastern Louisiana, Mississippi and Alabama coasts)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the AL/MS border in the vicinity of Mobile Bayâ€“Biloxi

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watch/warning and hurricane watch from the Mouth of the Mississippi River eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning east of the Mouth of the Pearl River to Navarre, FL; Tropical-Storm Warning Navarre, FL to Indian Pass, FL and Pearl River westward to Grand Isle, LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-central Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana through the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; occasional gusty showers possible
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered showers and a few squalls possible, but widespread heavy rain not anticipated
weather_observation.other_hazards: Strong rip currents along southeast Florida beaches
